message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $110, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $110 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $105?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll do $108, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm getting close to walking away, but I really want this product. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
